page.title: 11Biography
page.content: The local laird is Nigel Ivan, 22nd. Lord Forbes and Scotland's premier baron. Most of the land in the Keig area is owned by Forbes Estate and much of it farmed by the Forbes family partnership of Harthill Farms (see under "Farming"). Lord Forbes served throughout the war as a major in the Grenadier Guards, afterwards taking up dairy farming at Harthill Farm where he took up residence in the farm house, now called "Balforbes". Lord Forbes and his wife, Rosemary, have two sons and one daughter, all now married. His Lordship's business interests include directorships of Grampian Television, Blenheim Travel and Rolawn Turf.. Lord Forbes is a keen bird watcher and photographer.
